pkgmetadata.longdescription: Project Page : [rod2ik/mkdocs-graphviz](https://gitlab.com/rod2ik/mkdocs-graphviz)Some rendering examples can be seen on these pages:* Trees : https://eskool.gitlab.io/tnsi/donnees/arbres/quelconques/* Graphs : https://eskool.gitlab.io/tnsi/donnees/graphes/definitions/This project is part of other mkdocs-related projects. If you're interested, please consider having a look at this page for a more complete list of all our mkdocs-related projects:* https://eskool.gitlab.io/mkhack3rs/This project is the result of several independant participants :* For All newer Credits: Rodrigo Schwencke at [rod2ik/mkdocs-graphviz](https://gitlab.com/rod2ik/mkdocs-graphviz)* Cesare Morel at [cesaremorel/markdown-inline-graphviz](https://github.com/cesaremorel/markdown-inline-graphviz), and before him,* Steffen Prince at [sprin/markdown-inline-graphviz](https://github.com/sprin/markdown-inline-graphviz), * Initially inspired by Jawher Moussa at [jawher/markdown-dot](https://github.com/jawher/markdown-dot) In order to get it work with pip (python3) and mkdocs.If you use python 2, please consider using the original extension instead.Licences:* All newer parts (Rodrigo Schwencke) are [GPLv3+](https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0)* Older parts (Cesare Morel, Steffen Prince, Jawher Moussa) are [MIT License](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php)
